ygData.subject: - Fireworks
ygData.msgSnippet: Do any of you actually sell these?  I ve been carrying around all the components to make them lately, and even though I always give them away (no-one has ever
ygData.messageBody:
Do any of you actually sell these? I've been carrying around all the
components to make them lately, and even though I always give them away
(no-one has ever not accepted them), I seem to be making more money than
they cost me to make! Occationally I do make a dud, but I'd say they are
pretty much fixed now, good work verant! for best results have as many
people casting them as possible, some from far away some from close. I also
think that we should start flooding the servers with these, make loads and
give them away as much as possible (less than a gold piece for 4, I believe
they cost to make). for those who <dont> know how to make them, its easy.
put a gnomish spirits and a flask of water (flask) into your toolbox and
combine. now put the firewater back in the toolbox, add a metal shaft, and
a batwing, press combine voila!


Cogg - Rallos Zek

PS. dont forget to remind them not to use them near guards. And make sure
they take them out of their backpacks before lighting them... that is real
ugly
